items.title: VIP Post
items.purpose: Promotes the "VIP Program" (usually a $200 tip) which grants access to exclusive content styles.
items.strategy: Post once with a flyer; never repost. Set as a campaign starting at a $1,000 goal, expanding in $1,000 increments up to $10,000.

items.title: PPV Post (Pay-Per-View)
items.purpose: Selling a specific video.
items.strategy: General execution depends on page type.

attributes.paid_pages_strategy: Must be campaigns. Use a GIF or picture flyer.
attributes.free_pages_strategy: Can be post unlocks. Sometimes no flyer is needed.
attributes.content_guidelines: Long, descriptive, sexy caption with emojis.

items.title: Game Posts
items.purpose: A buying opportunity presented as a game (e.g., "Spin the Wheel") with a chance to win prizes.
items.strategy: Campaign style with a set price to play. Almost always uses a GIF.

items.title: Bundle Posts
items.purpose: Offering a content bundle at a set price.
items.strategy: Advertise the "deal value." Keep it sexy and eye-catching, not overly salesy. Use a GIF or picture flyer.

items.title: Flash Bundle Posts
items.purpose: A limited-quantity bundle to create urgency.
items.strategy: Campaign style with a generic graphic or model GIF/picture.

items.title: Snapchat Bundle
items.purpose: A specific bundle advertised as "old Snapchat nudes" (e.g., from age 18â€“19).
items.strategy: High conversion rate. Use a throwback picture with the Snapchat text bar as the flyer.

items.title: First To Tip Post
items.purpose: A gamified post where the goal matches the exact tip amount.
items.strategy: Visually enticing caption and flyer. Set to expire after 24 hours (or longer for higher goals).

items.title: Link Drop Posts
items.purpose: Pushes a previous post back to fans' feeds (similar to a retweet).
items.strategy: Short caption promoting a campaign or buying opportunity with the link to that post. Always expire after 24 hours.

attributes.note: If done correctly, the post preview will generate automatically.

items.title: Wall Post Link Drop
items.purpose: Promote a specific wall campaign.
items.strategy: Caption + Link. Must manually add a GIF/picture from the same scene (unlike standard link drops, these do not auto-display the preview). Great for pushing wall tips.

items.title: Normal Post Bump
items.purpose: Entice fans to DM you.
items.strategy: Cute/flirty picture. Caption should sound like a "horny girl" but keep it short.

items.title: Descriptive Bumps
items.purpose: Similar to normal bumps, but drives DMs through storytelling.
items.strategy: Uses a longer, sexually descriptive caption.

items.title: Text Only Bumps
items.purpose: Quick engagement without media.
items.strategy: Short, flirty, cute text.

items.title: Flyer/GIF Post Bumps
items.purpose: High-visibility bump.
items.strategy: Longer sexual caption paired with a designed flyer or GIF for maximum attention.

items.title: DM Farm Posts
items.purpose: Get fans to DM immediately (e.g., for a free surprise or because you are "active now").
items.strategy: GIF, picture, or flyer. Emoji incentives work best here.

items.title: Like Farm Posts
items.purpose: Boosts engagement metrics.
items.strategy: Encourage fans to "Like" all posts in exchange for a free incentive.

items.title: Live Promo Posts
items.purpose: Notify fans of an upcoming livestream.
items.strategy: Use a livestream flyer with the specific time and info in the caption.

items.title: Renew On Post (Paid Pages Only)
items.purpose: Convince fans to turn on auto-renewal.
items.strategy: Enticing caption with the auto-renew link. Can use GIFs, pictures, or videos.

items.title: Renew On Message (Mass Message)
items.purpose: Sent specifically to fans with auto-renewal off.
items.strategy: Offer a free prize/incentive to click the renewal link.

items.title: PPV/Unlock Message
items.purpose: Mass message to fans with a locked post.
items.strategy: Fully adjustable pricing. Can use a flyer, picture, GIF, or video.

items.title: PPV Follow Up
items.purpose: Sent 10â€“30 minutes after a PPV message to close the sale.
items.strategy: Bump, convince, or entice.

examples: I can't believe I just sent this
Offering a free nude if they buy immediately

items.title: Expired Subscriber Message (Paid Pages Only)
items.purpose: Win back former fans.
items.strategy: Run daily. Message must match the current subscriber campaign/incentive. Always send with picture/GIF flyers.
